_header: Here beth the words fair and sweet
_description: Prognostics according to the day of the week on which New Year falls — thirty-four couplets

CamMagPep2125.First Lines:
Here bith the wordes feire and swetethat ihesu schewed Esydras the
                    prophete…
CamMagPep2125.Last Lines:
…Olde men shullen dede beAnd frutes well growyng & wexing
                    on tree
CamMagPep2125.Editions:
Mooney,  Linne R. 
             “Practical Didactic Works in Middle English.” 
         Diss. Toronto, 1981: 348-51.
